titles.title: To expand the Farm Storage Facility Loan Program of the Department of Agriculture by making loans available to assist producers in providing storage for hay.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry.

committee.subcommittee: Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 12/13/2001--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to expand the Farm Storage Loan Program by making loans available for hay storage.
